tirateima.gui
Class Principal

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  tirateima.gui.Principal
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class Principal
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Classe principal do AlgoStep. Cria e controla todas as outras classes. Deve ser incluída num applet ou numa janela para ser útil.

See Also:
Applet, Programa, Serialized Form
